creator: katkere@praja.com
text:
Fixes for bugs 728, 746, 747, 948 made Jasper behave correctly under load (at 
least wrt ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException and NullPointerException), but we 
still have a hardcoded SimplePool size of 100 and usePool is always true. Make 
these configurable from server.xml.

This applies to all versions of Jasper.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Done in 3.3. Use pageContextPoolSize attribute of JspInterceptor.
